description: Jan Hein Hoogstad, known as Yeehaa, is a seasoned professional recognized for his deep insights and expertise, particularly in ecosystem architecture and internet fragmentation. He authored notable blog posts 'Align the Misaligned' and 'Continental Drift', which explore the future of internet design and global connectivity challenges, respectively. He also curated the course 'Align the Misaligned', focusing on personal and startup growth.
blurb: Yeehaa, alias of Jan Hein Hoogstad, is renowned for his expertise in ecosystem architecture and internet fragmentation, offering significant insights and innovative solutions.
